objects.specification: A broad flat rectangular floor plane with smooth white finish providing a bright and neutral base for the classroom.
A tall flat rectangular wall panel painted in a light neutral tone with smooth uniform surface.

A large rectangular whiteboard with glossy white surface, slim aluminum frame, and a slightly recessed writing area.
A substantial rectangular teacher’s desk in a dark wood tone featuring a smooth polished tabletop, sturdy legs, and a modesty panel.
An ergonomic teacher’s chair with padded seat and backrest in complementary green color, featuring four slender legs and slight recline.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector in matte white housing with vents and a lens protruding at the front.
A tall narrow bookshelf in matching wood tone with multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with books showing slight color variation.
A large rectangular window with transparent glass panes and light colored curtains softly draped along the sides.
